meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of the Grateful Dead.
meanings.sent1: Many deadheads attended the concert to hear their favorite band.
meanings.sent2: The deadheads gathered to celebrate the music of the Grateful Dead.
meanings.sent3: The deadheads danced joyfully to the tunes of the Grateful Dead.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of fans, the deadheads stood out with their tie-dye shirts.
meanings.sent5: The deadheads' love for the Grateful Dead was evident in their passionate cheers.

meanings.definition: A person who illegally obtains free rides on public transportation.
meanings.sent1: The city transit authority caught several deadheads trying to ride without paying.
meanings.sent2: Some deadheads sneak onto buses to avoid paying for tickets.
meanings.sent3: The deadheads thought they could outsmart the bus driver, but they were wrong.
meanings.sent4: The deadheads' scheme to ride for free was short-lived.
meanings.sent5: The deadheads' attempts to dodge fares often ended in trouble.

meanings.definition: A person who removes the blossoms from a plant to encourage more flowering.
meanings.sent1: The gardener carefully plucked the deadheads to help the plant bloom better.
meanings.sent2: Deadheads are removed to promote the growth of new flowers.
meanings.sent3: The deadheads were sacrificed for the greater good of the garden.
meanings.sent4: Removing deadheads is like giving the plant a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The garden flourished after the deadheads were removed with care.
